title: Blended Learning Course for Remote Chemistry Laboratory Education (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of high school-level basic chemistry concepts
context.additional_context: Flexibly scheduled for working professionals, combining experiments using personal devices with online learning.

learning_goals: Learners can safely use experimental equipment and materials with over 80% accuracy
Learners can perform chemical experiments according to given procedures and create digital reports (text and photos)
Learners can master laboratory safety regulations at over 90% proficiency through online safety quizzes
Learners can systematically document insights gained from experimental processes via weekly reflection journals
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
